features: 🍽【24 PCS SILVERWARE SET SERVICE FOR 4】: This silverware set comes with 4 Dinner Knife, 4 Steak Knives, 4 Dinner Forks, 4 Dinner Spoons, 4 Salad/Dessert Fork and 4 Dessert/Tea Spoons, essential for families or restaurants. The set is also an irreplaceable dining tool whether it is for daily use or for preparing dinners or parties.

🍽【PREMIUM STAINLESS STEEL】: This flatware set is made of high quality food grade stainless steel which is very durable, rust-proof, corrosion resistant, non-toxic, BPA free, no metal aftertaste. Meanwhile, its sturdiness ensures that it will not bend easily providing you with long - term use. Most importantly, they're dishwasher safe.

🍽【PROPER WEIGHT AND COMFORTABLE HANDLE】: Unlike other brands, the curvature of our utensil handles is designed according to the posture of the hand, and the appropriate weight and perfect balance are added to ensure maximum comfort during use that avoids you feel tired. Moreover, the smooth edges ensure safety and no scratches.

🍽【ELEGANT SHAPE AND EXQUISITE WORKMANSHIP】: Highly mirror polished, smooth edges and the classic shape design make this flatware set stunning and look expensive. It is very suitable for all your home styles and can match any tableware you have. There are no rough spots or sharp edges, very comfortable to use without hurting your mouth at all.

🍽【MULTIPLE USES】: Choosing a good set of cutlery is not only for everyday use, but also for upcoming holiday parties, gatherings, weddings, camping and entertainment, or for buffets and banquets at restaurants or hotels. It's also a wonderful choice as a gift.
🍽【LIFETIME SUPPORT】: If you have any questions about our silverware set, please contact us and we will solve it for you within 24 hours.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: MUTNITT silverware set is made of top food grade 18/10 stainless steel that ensures safety and durability. They are rust-proof, corrosion-resistant, non-toxic, sturdy structure and durable for daily use. With simple and elegant design, It is definitely the best set for serving families, entertaining guests or hosting parties, holiday meal, weddings, etc. Package includes: 9" Dinner Knife x 4 9" Steak Knives x 4 8" Dinner Spoon x 4 8" Dinner Fork x 4 6.7" Salad Fork x 4 6.7" Teaspoon x 4 Lifetime Support: If you have any questions about our silverware set, please send us an email and we will solve it for you within 24 hours. Using instruction: 1.Please wash the silverware set before first use to make sure no manufacturing residue. 2.Please clean the silverware set after using and dry the pieces for their durability. 3.Please do not use iron wire to scratch the pieces to keep their smooth surface. 4.The silverware set is Dishwasher Safe so you can run it in dishwasher to save your labor.

Comes with 4 steak knives, no need to purchase separately, the blade has sharp serrations, you can cut and slice various steaks and other meats effortlessly. The handle is reinforced by 3 layers of rivets, which is durable, and designed in line with holding posture, making it comfortable and easy to use. The curvature of our tableware handle is designed according to the posture of the hand, which makes it more comfortable to hold and will not feel tired after long-term use. The handle has some thickness, so it is comfortable to grip, and is strong enough not to bend or break. These tableware have proper thickness and uniform weight distribution, so that it has a good balance, which makes it more comfortable to use and not easy to feel fatigued. Also suitable for teenagers and young people.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sleek Elegance and Quality Craftsmanship - A Stellar Review for the 24 Pcs Black Silverware Set!
reviews.reviewText: The 24 Pcs Matte Black Silverware Set with Steak Knives is an absolute gem, effortlessly combining modern aesthetics with impeccable functionality. From its striking matte finish to the precision of each utensil, this stainless steel flatware set has left me thoroughly impressed.First and foremost, the matte black finish is a showstopper. The sleek and contemporary look of the silverware adds an element of sophistication to my dining experience. The alluring matte surface not only enhances the visual appeal but also exudes a premium feel that elevates the overall dining atmosphere.The set includes everything needed for a complete dining experience, and the addition of steak knives is a thoughtful touch. Each piece is crafted with precision, exhibiting a high level of attention to detail. The weight and balance of the utensils are perfect, providing a comfortable and ergonomic grip during use.The durability of the stainless steel construction is evident in the quality of this silverware set. The tarnish-resistant material ensures that the matte black finish remains pristine even with regular use and multiple washes. This set stands up well to the test of time, promising longevity and reliability.The versatility of the 24-piece set is noteworthy. From everyday family meals to special occasions, the flatware effortlessly adapts to various dining settings. The classic design allows for easy coordination with different table settings or dinnerware, making it a versatile addition to any kitchen.The practicality of this silverware set extends to its maintenance. Dishwasher safe and easy to clean, it simplifies post-meal cleanup and eliminates the hassle of handwashing delicate utensils.The set's packaging is secure and well-organized, and each piece is individually wrapped to prevent scratching or damage during transit. This attention to detail reflects the commitment to delivering a premium product.In conclusion, the 24 Pcs Matte Black Silverware Set with Steak Knives is a stellar addition to any dining collection. Its blend of modern aesthetics, durable construction, and thoughtful design make it a top-tier choice for those seeking quality flatware. If you're looking to upgrade your dining experience with a touch of elegance, this silverware set is a definite five-star recommendation! Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars "Elevate Your Dining Experience"
reviews.reviewText: The 24 Piece Silverware Set with Steak Knives is an excellent choice for anyone looking for a high-quality, durable, and elegant flatware set. The set includes 4 sets of utensils, each consisting of a dinner fork, salad fork, dinner knife, tablespoon, and teaspoon, as well as 4 steak knives.One of the standout features of this silverware set is the quality of the stainless steel. The flatware is made of high-quality 18/0 stainless steel, which is known for its durability and resistance to corrosion. The utensils are also dishwasher safe, making them easy to clean and maintain.Another great feature of this silverware set is its mirror-polished finish. The utensils have a sleek and shiny appearance, which adds a touch of elegance to any table setting. The design is simple yet modern, making it a great choice for both formal and casual dining occasions.The steak knives included in this set are also of excellent quality. They are sharp and sturdy, with serrated edges that make cutting through even the toughest meats a breeze. The knives are also made of high-quality stainless steel, ensuring that they will last for years to come.Overall, I highly recommend the 24 Piece Silverware Set with Steak Knives for anyone looking for a high-quality, durable, and elegant flatware set. The set is versatile and perfect for both formal and casual dining occasions, and the steak knives are a great addition for meat lovers. The mirror-polished finish adds a touch of elegance to any table setting, making this set a great investment for any home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The quality of this product is excellent. All 24 pieces included are really nice. The cutting knives are strong and durable, comparable to more expensive ones. The serving spoons are very convenient and sturdy. Overall, everything is good, and I love the product. It's definitely worth the money we paid for it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We bought these when we moved into our new apartment. They are great quality and I love how many pieces it came with for the price. The only thing is that the knives started rusting only after the first week.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pictures lie, Knives are cheap
reviews.reviewText: So a pictures worth a thousand words. Except here. Read the description.The silverware(butter knives, fork, spoons) Couldn't be happier with, sturdy in strength, feels good in hand, and looks great. (High Fingerprint visibility however after handling)The "steak knives" just toss em when ya get them. They're junk, cheap made plastic handles, and the metal in the knives is a completely different metal than the silverware.Now my only gripe and it's on me for not throughly reading. But when the picture shows 5 of each item and you receive 4 of each item its a little disappointing to go back and read that yes it does say set for 4.So a 3 star for the quality and look of the silverware, if the knives were better and the pictures weren't extremely intentionally misleading it would be a 5 star. The knives could still be junk and I'd still give it a 5 star if the pictures weren't misleading.So read the description, and beware of knives. Other than that I would recommend!
